Reviews.Title: “Lux is not short for Luxurious!!!”
Reviews.Author: 1DFan
Reviews.Content: star hotel dont minus star school trip stayed lovely hotel sorrento rome expectations hotel equally nice previous wrong fussy bunch teenagers expect basics teachers complaining absolutely tiny twin beds struggled fit regular sized suitcases door wouldnt close lock properly uncomfortable third fusty smell smelt damp thankfully ours didnt classmates blood stain curtain toilet wouldnt flush properly sockets broken shower door wouldnt close beds extremely low poor lighting cramped hotel corridors narrow awkward 42 noisy excited sixteen olds move breakfast couldnt eat joke am fussy eater croissants blue mould bread hard toaster orange juice pineapple juice likes instead sweet milk smelly water cracked chipped luckily brought food didnt starve morning typical irish teenagers cant survive cup tea guess tea classmate brought teabags survived hotel doesnt kitchen ie microwave teachers porridge morning couldnt microwave mad isnt told hotel staff super rude grumpy im letting excuse noisy teenagers fairly quiet drinks mini fridge free charge check looking pay drinks refused werent impressed time rome spent little time hotel hotel disappointing understatement returning hotel lux staying hotel lux cost twin bb night €100 fantastic value dont

Reviews.Title: “Basic accommodation but very clean hotel and polite staff.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel lux 3 nights single closet view wall window feeling immediately claustrophobic hotel apologetically offered spacious double balcony improvement luxurious found hotel clean pleasant polite accommodating staff
